source.name: Griffon's Saddlebag Book 1
source.author: Griffon's Saddlebag
source.description:
A collection of hundreds of illustrated, game-ready magic items for any fifth edition setting. Each item is balanced and peer reviewed by thousands of active followers, commenters, and community members, so you can rest easy knowing that these items won't upset the delicate balance of your campaigns.
This book contains 365 unique magic items, 12 new subclasses, 3 new settings, 1 new villain, and 1 new playable race that you can introduce into your favorite fifth edition games.
